channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [LIM1][Cooling System] - L107A04
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 13, 04:00 - 06:00 UTC

Aug 18, 22:09 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 13/09/2022 04:00 UTC
End time : 13/09/2022 06:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be carrying out a maintenance on the cooling system of the rack L107A04.

item.title: [SBG3][Network] - Network equipment operation
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 5, 20:00 - 23:59 UTC

Aug 22, 12:07 UTC
Update - The maintenance has been postponed. Here is the new schedule :
Start time : 05/09/2022 20:00 UTC
End time : 05/09/2022 23:59 UTC

Aug 16, 19:26 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 23/08/2022 20:00 UTC
End time : 23/08/2022 23:59 UTC
Service impact : Loss of all service behind the concerned devices for 30 minutes each one.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on some network equipment.

item.title: [GRA1][Network] - Network equipment replacement

Aug 31, 18:03 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 02/09/2022 00:00 UTC
